title: Sans Serif light
content:
Only need the DalSense font, I have the braille. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071119im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dalsense_Logo_6153.jpg)

Font: 

 Geo Sans Light 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071119/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: RWE

comments.content: Don't think it's a typeface as it, rather a custom job based on some ' [Futura-like](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071119/http:/myfonts.us/td-wMbetY)'. As base font, you could either go with **[Geo Sans Light MK](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071119/http:/www.dafont.com/geo-sans-light.font)** (the closest, possibly matching), [Sans Serif FLF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071119/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/casady_greene/r_z.htm) or [Josefin Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071119/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Josefin-Sans).
Geo Sans Light with a modified a and e. Thanks.
